basics.name: Managam Silalahi
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Managam is an indie Software Engineer currently focusing on Software Development. I have over 2 years of programming experiences, and is experienced in a wide variety of languages including Swift, Objective-C, NodeJS, Javascript. Specialties: Software Development, iOS Development, Swift, Objective-C, NodeJS, Javascript.

work.summary: YesBoss is your personal virtual assistant for all your demands. YesBoss is an SMS-based personal virtual assistant which eases your daily life and saves your time.
highlights: Develop Core Services for YesBoss Technology environment
Work together in defining and implementing the best technology stack for our technology development.
Develop and maintain YesBoss app codebase.
Actively participate on features and tools development with design and product team

work.summary: Morra is a web & mobile development company, located in Surabaya, Indonesia. We help designers to make their designs come true.
work.highlights: Build mobile native apps using Objective-C and Swift.

work.summary: Nesiagame is a company engaged in the field of online game developers and publishers as well as software integration.
work.highlights: Build mobile and web apps with HTML, CSS, JS, Ionic, AngularJS.

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
